headline: This Unstoppable Telecom Giant Returned More Capital to Shareholders Than Both AT&T and Verizon Over the Past Year, and It Just Raised Its Dividend 35%
summary: One thing that attracts many investors to telecom stocks are the great dividend yields offered by many companies in the industry.  Subscription revenue and long-term contracts are a great recipe for predictable free cash flow.  Verizon Communications (NYSE: VZ), for example, paid out $11.2 billion to shareholders over the last 12 months.
